resources.string: Permission is missing, cannot start service!

Tap \'n\' Turn should be run with auto-rotation enabled. It will enforce the user selected orientation by drawing an invisible overlay over the screen. That is why it needs that permission. You can temporarily enable/disable the screen overlay by touching the notification.
Restore default orientation on screen off
Tap \'n\' Turn disabled: permission to draw overlays got lost!

Tap\'n\'Turn v%1$s

A small and handy screen orientation utility.

Thank you for using Tap\'n\'Turn! This app is a community project and has been originally created by Matthias Gabriel.

If you want to participate in the development of Tap\'n\'Turn by submitting code, artwork, translations or reporting bugs, then please use our project page on GitHub. Further we have a riot.im channel under #TapAndTurn:matrix.org open for discussion.

License

The source code of Tap\'n\'Turn is released to public domain under the terms of the GPLv3 or newer.

The trademarks \"Tap\'n\'Turn\" as well as similar identifiers like \"TapAndTurn\", \"Tap and Turn\" are owned by Matthias Gabriel. All rights are reserved. The preferred written from is \"Tap\'n\'Turn\". These trademarks are used to refer to the source code, the binary releases as well as the community (herafter: "the Project"). You are granted the right to use these trademarks to refer to the Project in discussions, documentations and written publications. You may not use these trademarks for binary releases without permit by the original author. If you want to distribute derived work, you have to use a different name.

Contact

You can contact me via mail gabmtuc gmail com or at riot.im under @gabm:matrix.org.
